alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:22AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Teton County through 645 AM MDT... At 620 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm about 15 miles west northwest of Jackson moving east northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This thunderstorm will be near... Teton Village and Rendezvous Peak around 635 AM MDT. Phelps Lake around 640 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Moose, Kelly and Grand Teton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
